titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Mabel Hancock Holt Papers, 1945-1946, 2006
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections SC 0260
titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: JMU Division of University Advancement. Karen Ahrens Wheatley

did.abstract: This collection contains the booklet, "Class of 1946 Madison Memories," printed in 2006 for the alumni reunion, and Madison College ephemera belonging to 1946 alum, Mabel Hancock Holt.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection open to research. Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection. Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the James Madison University Special Collections Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have been transferred to the James Madison University Special Collections Library. For more information, contact the Special Collections Library Reference Desk (library-special@jmu.edu).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], [box #, folder #], Mabel Hancock Holt Papers, 1945-1946, 2006, SC 0260, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, VA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Items were transferred from JMU University Advancement, on January 12, 2018.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Items were donated to the JMU Advancement Office by Estelle K. Tulloss Wagner, a friend of Mabel Hancock Holt.

bioghist.head: Bio/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Mabel Hancock Holt was born December 13, 1923 in Martinsville, Virginia. She attended Madison College from 1942-1946, where she was senior class president of the Student Government Association and a member of the Cotillion Club. She died September 25, 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is comprised of papers belonging to 1946 Madison College alum, Mabel Hancock Holt. It contains a 1945 Western Union telegram, issues of "The Breeze" dated October 12, and October 19, 1945, a 1946 commencement invitation, and photocopies from "The Schoolma'am" (undated). It also includes a booklet, "Class of 1946 Madison Memories," printed in 2006 for an alumni reunion.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Items are housed in a legal folder.

bibliography.head: Bibliography
bibliography.p: Find A Grave. “Mabel Hancock Holt (1923-2017).” Find a Grave Memorial no. 183965126. Accessed January https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/183965126
